Tutorials¶

Here are pre-built tutorials that are designed to guide you through the various features and processing pipelines setup in the package.

  • Tutorial 2 - Data organization inside packerlabimaging

    • paq data
    • Suite2p data
    • Annotated Data
  • Tutorial 3 - Making Useful Plots
    • plot Suite2p ROIs location
    • plot default output images from Suite2p
    • plot individual cell’s flu or dFF trace
    • Raw average trace of FOV
